reviewText: I like this release and I will tell you why. While I do like having the season sets with the original broadcast versions of the 2 hour episodes, the 2 part versions, although only 2 on this set, often contain shorter scenes and/or some rearranged sequences to fill the time for the syndicated run. Maybe in the future there will be a 2nd volume with the remaining 2 part versions of the other 4 double length episodes. Perhaps they (Universal) will do the same for other series such as Battlestar Galactica and Buck Rogers where they include the 3 part pilot and the 2 part version of Greetings From Earth and for Buck Rogers the 2 hour original pilot, not the movie version that was substituted for the pilot in the epic series set and the 2 part versions of Planet of the Slave Girls and Flight of the War Witch. Both of which included alternate sequences of scenes to work around the timing for the ever so popular freeze frame scene with "TO BE CONTINUED" across the screen.
summary: I actually like these mini sets.....
Title: The Best of the 80s: Knight Rider

Title: The Best of the 80s: Knight Rider

reviewText: I rate this cause this is the best of the 80's Knight Rider ever. The episode I like best is K.I.T.T. VS. K,A,R.R. I like the actors in this film. It comes with 9 episodes In a two disc. Disc one comes with season 1 Knight Of The Phoenix Part 1 and Part 2. Season 1 Deadly Maneuvers. Season 1 Trust Doesn't Rust. And on dsc two season 2 Goliath Part 1 and Part 2. Season 3 K.I.T.T. VS. K.A.R.R. Season 3 Junk Yard Dog. Season 4 K.I.T.T.NAP and Season 4 Voodoo Knight. And it was a cheap price and it came with free shipping and I had to get it.

reviewText: I've always liked Knight Rider and I bought this so my granddaughter could see it.  She loves Kitt and sat to watch the whole set  with me.  I recommend.
